author: BBC News
title: Russian forces seize Chernobyl nuclear power plant
description: The power plant, the site of a 1986 nuclear disaster, has been taken over by Russian troops.
content:
Image source, Getty Images
Russian military forces have seized control of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, Ukrainian officials say.
